item.title: Getting started
item.description: Requirements # You will need to install a few different tools to work with Fabulous: .NET 6.0 SDK or newer (link) A compatible IDE: Visual Studio 2021 or newer (link) Visual Studio 2019 for Mac or newer (link) JetBrains Rider (link - available for Windows and macOS) During installation, you will be asked to choose the workloads you want. Be sure to select the mobile development workload and F#.
